name: The Murder On Hemlock Drive Demo
name_original: The Murder On Hemlock Drive Demo
description:
As you travel to meet an old childhood friend for the Holidays, you would never have suspected your night of partying would be the stage for murder!

Attempt to solve the murder using a style that you cultivate as you play, but be aware or you may be murdered yourself!

This is a free to play Demo for the project! Follow me @ hemlockmurder.com or instagram @hemlockmurder for game updates and news on the final release. This is the first game that I've created and I am interested to know your feedback. If you can spare the time, here is a quick survey that you can fill out to help support development, Thanks!

Features

A branching story that allows you to mix and match a variety of styles:

  • The Classy Individual: As a person of means and manors you walk around with an aura of respect. Though many things come easy, be aware that deference may hide secrets.
  • The Charismatic Youth: With you, there’s never a lull in conversation and you’ve always found a friend to gossip with. However, your talkative ways often leaves you distracted from the machinations going on around you.
  • The Intelligent Scholar: You have always been observant and quick witted. You have never met a problem you could not solve. But be careful, not all people respond to logos as well as you think they should.
